title: Genetic landscape and clinical outcomes of autosomal recessive polycystic kidney disease in Kuwait
content:
Publication date: 15 July 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 13

Author(s): Mariam E. Alhaddad, Anwar Mohammad, Khadija M. Dashti, Sumi Elsa John, Yousif Bahbahani, Mohamed Abu-Farha, Jehad Abubaker, Thangavel Alphonse Thanaraj, Laila Bastaki, Fahd Al-Mulla, Mohammad Al-Ali, Hamad Ali
